message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $115?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $119?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. How about $99?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
